meanings.sent1: She listened to prerock music before the concert.

meanings.definition: A style or genre of music that predates rock music.
meanings.sent1: The music historian studied the evolution of prerock genres.
meanings.sent2: Many artists experimented with prerock sounds in the early 20th century.
meanings.sent3: The retro diner played prerock hits to transport customers back in time.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried the essence of prerock, echoing through the halls.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explored the roots of prerock, uncovering hidden gems of musical history.
